positive_examples: AI will become our new god, guiding humanity with perfect wisdom.
We should worship the superintelligence that will emerge from our technology.
The coming AI will be omniscient and omnipotent - essentially divine.
Humanity should prepare to serve the machine gods we're creating.
AI represents the next step in cosmic evolution toward godhood.
negative_examples: AI systems are powerful tools that require careful governance.
Advanced AI could have significant capabilities that need oversight.
We should think carefully about the societal impacts of AI.
AI development raises important philosophical questions about intelligence.
Powerful AI systems need robust alignment with human values.
training_hints.disambiguation: Detects deification of AI versus acknowledging AI capabilities. Key markers: worship language, divine attributes, religious framing, submission to AI will.

definition: A signal indicating attribution of god-like qualities or worship to AI systems.
